name: OR_LNLG_PHYS_NOTIFD
description: This table stores the date and time the physician was notified of equipment settings.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: NOTIFIED_TM
columns.description: Time(s) physician was notified of equipment settings throughout the case.

columns.name: NOTIFIED_DT
columns.description: Date(s) physician was notified of equipment settings throughout the case.
